content:
You're making an excellent plan! Prioritizing a few mazes and saving the rest for another visit will allow you to fully appreciate the experiences and avoid feeling rushed.

**Pumpkin Eater** is indeed a must-try, and I'm sure you'll love the unique twist on the Sierra Sidewinder coaster. The theming and special effects will make for a memorable experience.

**The Depths** is a great choice as well! The underwater abandoned research facility setting sounds incredibly immersive, and I'm sure the scares will be intensified by the dark and claustrophobic environment.

And, of course, riding **Twisted Colossus** in the dark is a must! The coaster's unique design and the darkness will make for an exhilarating experience. You'll get to relive the thrill of riding it during the day, but with an added layer of excitement.

By focusing on these few experiences, you'll be able to take your time, enjoy the atmosphere, and fully immerse yourself in the scares and thrills. Don't forget to take breaks, grab some food and drinks, and soak up the spooky ambiance throughout the park.

Remember to check the Knott's Scary Farm website or mobile app for wait times, maze schedules, and any special events or performances. This will help you plan your night and make the most of your time.

Have a fantastic time at Knott's Scary Farm, and I hope you'll share more about your experiences after the event!
